ComicInfo.Title: The Curse of Steven Navarro
ComicInfo.Summary: El Bute is back in a big way with this final issue of his runaway hit comic book. A 32-page epic from one of the Spanish masters of erotic comic. Adult film stars have their own set of difficulties when interacting with each other becomes a major tribulation on and off the porno set. Donâ€™t miss this hilarious set of events packed full of some the most outrageous sex acts ever.
